attributes.action: save the post offices of Hull from closure by Royal Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royal Mail plans to close six Hull area Post offices situated on Spring Bank, Princes Avenue, 504 Beverley Road, Hawthorn Avenue, Hedon Road and in Kirkella. Many thousands of people will be inconvenienced by this, people who have enjoyed the use of local post offices for generations. 

Each extra journey such closures may occasion would amount to a theft from the people in terms of time, money and inconvenience. We pay taxes precisely to support good levels of public services. Please show your support for this petition and safeguard our local post offices.
